analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 8.41. Cittānuparivattiduka🔽Nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacittānuparivatti dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: citta anuparivatti duka  na citta anuparivattim dhammam paṭicca na citta anuparivatti dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Pairs in Terms of Being Associated and Not Associated with Mind🔽With mind-outcome as condition there arises the not-mind-outcome. (In brief.)🔽With cause as condition, the not-cause. (In brief.)🔽With the nine kinds of root-cause as condition, the not-root-cause. (In brief.)
With the nine kinds of cause as condition, the not-cause. (In brief.)🔽With the nine kinds of condition as condition, the not-condition. (In brief.)
